Module com.example.softmeth4
Package com.example.softmeth4

Class CurrentOrderController

java.lang.Object
com.example.softmeth4.CurrentOrderController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CurrentOrderController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
This controller class allows customers to manage and display their current pizza order on a JavaFX application This class contains methods to remove pizzas from an order and calculate total values, as well as various event handlers to handle popups and other events when buttons/checkboxes/combo boxes are selected and/or interacted with.

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Initializes listeners and event handlers for various UI elements, including the combo box selection changes and button clicks that occur in the interface. (ex: removes pizzas from an order and places an order when the respective buttons are clicked)
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - - url
      resourceBundle - - resource bundle

    • refresh

      public void refresh()
      Refreshes the UI to reflect the current state of the order, including pizza details, order number, subtotal, sales tax, and order total.

    • placeOrder

      public void placeOrder()
      Places the current order, adding it to the store's orders and resetting the current order.

    • removeSelectedPizza

      Removes the selected pizza from the order.

      private void calculateSubtotal()
      Calculates the subtotal of the pizza order.

    • calculateSalesTax

      private void calculateSalesTax()
      Calculates the sales tax of the pizza order. The sales tax in NJ is 6.625%.

    • calculateOrderTotal

      private void calculateOrderTotal()
      Calculates the total amount of the pizza order.
